title: Topic 003 Question 028
body: You have an Azure virtual machine named VM1.
From Microsoft Defender for Cloud, you get the following high-severity recommendation: `Install endpoint protection solutions on virtual machine`.
You need to resolve the issue causing the high-severity recommendation.
options: Add the Microsoft Antimalware extension to VM1.
Install Microsoft System Center Security Management Pack for Endpoint Protection on VM1.
Add the Network Watcher Agent for Windows extension to VM1.
Onboard VM1 to Microsoft Defender for Endpoint.
